DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (rTMS) is effective in the cognitive rehabilitation of patients with diffuse axonal injury(DAI) after Traumatic Brain Injury(TBI).
DOC.brief_title: Brain Stimulation for Traumatic Brain Injury
